entities.name: septumsempra
entities.description: The spell is mentioned in the context of a team celebrating or commiserating in their common room.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: She is described as having an unreadable expression and swinging forward to reveal a celebration behind her.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: He is mentioned as yelling 'We won!' and brandishing the silver Cup at Harry.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: He is described as being pulled into the room by several hands and looking around to see Ginny running towards him.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: She is mentioned as having a hard, blazing look in her face and throwing her arms around Harry.

entities.name: silver cup
entities.description: It is described as being brandished by Ron at Harry.

entities.name: common room
entities.description: The team's common room is mentioned as the place where they celebrate or commiserate.

relationships.description: Harry kissed Ginny without thinking, planning it, or worrying about the fact that fifty people were watching.
Ron congratulated Harry by yelling 'We won!' and brandishing the silver Cup at him.
